text: Raintree County is a 1957 American romance movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and based on the 1948 novel of the same name by Ross Lockridge Jr.. It stars Elizabeth Taylor, Montgomery Clift, Eva Marie Saint, Lee Marvin, Rod Taylor, Walter Abel and were distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for four Academy Awards in 1958. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 romance movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:1950s epic movies Category:1950s American romance movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Kentucky Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies set in Indiana Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Raintree County
